colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI KHRO BO'I RIGS SU SKYES PA'I MING MI BSKYOD RDO RJE 'AM A'A: YUR A'A PARTA YA ZHES PA'I RNAL 'BYOR CHEN POS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA'I NGOR, GNAS CHUNG CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO'I BKA' LUNG GIS MER GEN PANTIR 'BOD PA'I PHRANG CHUNG RAB 'BYAMS PA GRAGS PA BSKAL BZANG RAB RGYAS KYIS, SMAN RIM BLA MA YE SHES DBANG PHYUG GI ZHAL NAS BYUNG BA LTAR 'PHRAL DU LUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA DANG 'GRO BA YONGS @003B LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: GRAGS PA BSKAL BZANG RAB RGYAS,
